name: Josh Miller
body:
![Josh Miller](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/40125507/Josh%20Miller.png)

### Basic Info

Just before my senior year, I left Princeton University to build [Branch](http://www.branch.com) and [Potluck](http://www.potluck.it). You can read more about that story in [The New York Observer](http://betabeat.com/2012/05/josh-miller-branch-profile-05022012/?show=all). Originally from Santa Monica, CA, I currently live in New York City's East Village. I'm twenty-two years old, and was recently named to [Forbes' 30 Under 30 List](http://www.forbes.com/pictures/lmf45fdij/josh-miller/). 

### Selected Works

* [Tenth Grade Tech Trends](https://medium.com/product-design/d8d4f2300cf3)
* [The Next Facebook](https://medium.com/musings-about-text-boxes/8157c364d26a)
* [FWD.us Breaks Its First Promise: To Be Different](https://medium.com/i-m-h-o/7c2042e0d0df)
* [Tracking To Nowhere (Short Documentary)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NcSxJQ6gyLY)

### Contact Info
